title: If you want more cool ACS secondary class icons
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:info-ayers
|lang=en
|page=more-acs-icons
|authorPage=http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/shineshadowd
|comments=**Author:** [[*user ShineShadowD]]@@ @@
]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

+ So, are you confused because there isn't [[[component:anomaly-class-bar|ACS]]] icons you want to use?

+++ Hei ! Here are m-o-r-e Secondary Class icons.

----
++ How to use them in Esoteric Classes ?[[footnote]]Modified from [[[component:anomaly-class-bar|ACS Guide]]][[/footnote]]
+++ Remember to use lowercase letters, bro.
[[div_ class="help"]]
> 
> Beginning of include ↦
> 
> Item # of SCP ↦
> 
> Clearance Level //USE DIGITS (5,4,3,2,1,0)// ([[[anomaly-classification-system-guide|See guide]]])↦
> 
> Container Class (Also known as Object Class) ↦
> 
> OPTIONAL Secondary Class (If Using, set Container Class to //Esoteric//) ↦
> 
> If secondary class is used, place URL  here ↦
> 
> Disruption Class ([[[anomaly-classification-system-guide|See Guide]]] & Read Below for Explanation) ↦
> 
> Risk Class ([[[anomaly-classification-system-guide|See Guide]]] & Read Below for Explanation) ↦
> 
> End of include ↦
> 

> 
> {{[[@@include@@ :scp-wiki:component:anomaly-class-bar-source}}
> 
> {{|item-number= XXXX}}
> 
> {{|clearance= #}}
> 
> {{|container-class= euclid}}
> 
> {{|secondary-class= none}}
> 
> {{|secondary-icon= http://urlhere.com}}
> 
> {{|disruption-class= vlam}}
> 
> {{|risk-class= warning}}
> 
> {{]]}}
> 
[[/div]]

----
++ Examples
+++ It looks interesting.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:anomaly-class-bar-source
|item-number= XXXX
|clearance= 5
|container-class= esoteric
|secondary-class= gevurah
|secondary-icon= http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/Gevurah.svg
|disruption-class= ekhi
|risk-class= critical
]]
@@ @@
[[include :scp-wiki:component:anomaly-class-bar-source
|item-number= YYYY
|clearance= 3
|container-class= esoteric
|secondary-class= maksur
|secondary-icon= http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/Maksur.svg
|disruption-class= dark
|risk-class= warning
]]
@@ @@
[[include :scp-wiki:component:anomaly-class-bar-source
|item-number= ZZZZ
|clearance= 6
|container-class= esoteric
|secondary-class= chhokmah
|secondary-icon= http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/Chhokmah.svg
|disruption-class= amida
|risk-class= caution
]]
@@ @@
----
++ Here are the icons you want !
+++ The extra icons are all self-drawn, and the basic icons are inherent to ACS.
+++ Classification and footnotes Refer to [[[esoteric-classes-complete-list|A Comprehensive List of Esoteric Classes]]]
++++++ Update from time to time, mainly based on "Established Esoteric Classes". 
[[div_ class="step_container"]]
+ Extra ACS Icons
[[div_ class="icons"]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/Cernnunos.svg]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
Cernnunos[[footnote]]Item can be functionally contained, but the Foundation cannot achieve this for logistical and/or ethical reasons. (Redrawing,--the reason is that when I was painting, I didn't notice that the original version had ×--)
[[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_link"]]
[http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/Cernnunos.svg Link]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/Chhokmah.svg]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
Chhokmah[[footnote]]Item is entangled with baseline and its containment would affect intelligent entities.
[[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_link"]]
[http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/Chhokmah.svg Link]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/Continua.svg]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
Continua[[footnote]]Item has been completely affected by the disappearance of a special part of the anomaly.
[[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_link"]]
[http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/Continua.svg Link]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/Drygioni.svg]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
Drygioni[[footnote]]Item is currently under an official investigation for authenticity by the Overseer Council.[[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_link"]]
[http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/Drygioni.svg Link]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/Embla.svg]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
Embla[[footnote]]Item is used by the Foundation to create anomalies.[[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_link"]]
[http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/Embla.svg Link]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/Eparch.svg]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
Eparch[[footnote]]Item is non-anomalous but related to the anomalous.[[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_link"]]
[http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/Eparch.svg Link]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/Gevurah.svg]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
Gevurah[[footnote]]Item endangers the inner structure of the Foundation and limits the ability of the Foundation to carry out its secondary objectives.[[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_link"]]
[http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/Gevurah.svg Link]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/解除分级.svg]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
Declassified [[footnote]]Item has been revealed to the Foundation and/or public at large.[[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_link"]]
[http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/解除分级.svg Link]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/Maksur.svg]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
Maksur[[footnote]]Item has been separated into several anomalous parts which must be kept separate.[[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_link"]]
[http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/Maksur.svg Link]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/Necropsar.svg]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
Necropsar[[footnote]]There is no credible evidence to support the existence of Item in a kind of social history (generally the social history of standard Homo sapiens). However, through the observation of historical view and the observation of planning department, the validity of project existence can be confirmed from other historical processes, and at the same time, a series of potential signs/symptoms that may/will exist in the Item can be found.[[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_link"]]
[http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/Necropsar.svg Link]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/NA.svg]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
N/A
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_link"]]
[http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/NA.svg Link]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/ROLL.svg]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
ROLL[[footnote]]Errors such as garbled code are caused by abnormal items in project classification. The reference is from [[[SCP-5856]]].[[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_link"]]
[http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/ROLL.svg Link]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/Yesod.svg]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
Yesod[[footnote]]Item has been integrated into the Foundation's command structure.[[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_link"]]
[http://smlt.wikidot.com/local--files/shineshadowd:gyd4/Yesod.svg Link]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

----
+ Basic ACS icon
[[div_ class="icons"]]
[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/component:anomaly-class-bar/apollyon-icon.svg]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
apollyon[[footnote]]Item is uncontainable and actively causing the end of the world.[[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_link"]]
[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/component:anomaly-class-bar/apollyon-icon.svg Link]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/component:anomaly-class-bar/archon-icon.svg]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
archon[[footnote]]Item is able to be contained but ought not to be.[[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_link"]]
[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/component:anomaly-class-bar/archon-icon.svg Link]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/component:anomaly-class-bar/cernunnos-icon.svg]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
cernunnos[[footnote]]Item can be functionally contained, but the Foundation cannot achieve this for logistical and/or ethical reasons.[[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_link"]]
[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/component:anomaly-class-bar/cernunnos-icon.svg Link]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/component:anomaly-class-bar/hiemal-icon.svg]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
hiemal[[footnote]]Item is a system of two or more distinct but related anomalies that keep each other under control.[[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_link"]]
[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/component:anomaly-class-bar/hiemal-icon.svg Link]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/component:anomaly-class-bar/tiamat-icon.svg]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
tiamat[[footnote]]Item poses an immediate threat to humanity, but can be "contained" via open warfare or other Veil-breaking operations.[[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_link"]]
[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/component:anomaly-class-bar/tiamat-icon.svg Link]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/component:anomaly-class-bar/ticonderoga-icon.svg]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
ticonderoga[[footnote]]Item cannot be contained but does not need to be contained.[[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_link"]]
[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/component:anomaly-class-bar/ticonderoga-icon.svg Link]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/component:anomaly-class-bar/thaumiel-icon.svg]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
thaumiel[[footnote]]Item is used to contain other anomalies.[[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_link"]]
[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/component:anomaly-class-bar/thaumiel-icon.svg Link]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]





[[/div]]
[[/div]]














[[module css]]

:root {
    --five-color: 196,2,51;
    --four-color: 255,109,0;
    --three-color: 255,211,0;
    --two-color: 0,135,189;
    --one-color: 0,159,107;
}

.color-five {
    background-color: rgb(var(--five-color));
}

.color-four {
    background-color: rgb(var(--four-color));
}

.color-three {
    background-color: rgb(var(--three-color));
}

.color-two {
    background-color: rgb(var(--two-color));
}

.color-one {
    background-color: rgb(var(--one-color));
}

.color-gray {
    background-color: rgba(var(--gray-monochrome, 66, 66, 72),0.15);
}

.color-white {
    background-color: rgb(var(--white-monochrome, 252, 252, 252));
}

.color-black {
    background-color: rgb(var(--black-monochrome, 12, 12, 12));
}

.icons {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(5, calc((100% / 5) - 0.25rem));
    grid-gap: 0.25rem;
}

.class-table-box {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr 75%;
    background-color: rgb(var(--black-monochrome));
    grid-gap: 0.125rem;
    margin-top: 0.5rem;
}

.class-table-box > div {
    padding: 0.5rem;
}

.class-name {
    font-family: var(--title-font);
    font-size: 1.15em;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
}

.class-description {
    background-color: rgb(var(--white-monochrome));
}

@media (max-width: 500px ) {
.icons {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(3, calc((100% / 3) - 0.25rem));
}
}

.icon_image {
    border-radius: 50%;
    border: 0.25rem solid  rgb(var(--black-monochrome, 12, 12, 12));
    overflow: hidden;
}

.icon_name,
.icon_link {
    font-family: var(--title-font);
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    text-align: center; 
    text-transform: uppercase;
}

h1, h2 {
    text-align: center;
}

.step_container {
    margin: 0.5rem 0;
    border: 1px solid #999;
    padding: 1em;
}

.help {
    display: flex;
    align-content: stretch;
    padding-top: 1em;
    border-top: 1px dashed #999;
}

.help blockquote {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: 85%;
}

.help blockquote > p {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    align-items: center;
    align-content: center;
    margin-right: 0;
    min-height: 2rem;
    margin: 0;
}

.help blockquote > p * {
    margin: 0 0.1rem;
    height: 100%;
}

.help blockquote:nth-of-type(1) {
    width: 50%;
    background: transparent;
    border: unset;
    box-shadow: unset;
    text-align: right;
    margin-right: 0;
    padding: 0;
}

.help blockquote:nth-of-type(1) > p {
    justify-content: flex-end;
}

.help blockquote:nth-of-type(2) {
    margin-left: 1em;
    width: 50%;
}

#page-content > .collapsible-block {
    display: block;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 0.75em;
    background-color: lightgrey;
    border-top: 0.125rem dashed slategrey;
    border-bottom: 0.125rem dashed slategrey;
}

#page-content > div.collapsible-block > div.collapsible-block-unfolded > div.collapsible-block-content {
    text-align:left;
}
[[/module]]
[[module CSS]]
#page-title {
    text-align: center;

}
[[/module]]
